title: First mission error
body: i did the first mission for the new VS and it only gave me one icon and not both ?

replies.body: It looks like Riven's icon is taking a few minutes until it's properly added onto players accounts. I've got yours pulled up now, and it looks like her icon finally came through! Be sure to double check your list of icons, and you should see Riven's right next to Yasuo's.
I'm having the same issue. It's been about a half hour and I still haven't gotten my Riven icon.
